backend/main.mo: Defines core Motoko types for users, memberships, publishing works, releases, recording projects, and artist development, including status enums and linking structures.
feature_evidence.json: Reports feature evidence for rollout 21.7 and smoke‑test validation, listing involved files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend modules focused on upgrade‑safe rendering, link management, and related‑records UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining CSS variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the frontend app via a root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/ROLL_OUT_21_7_EXECUTION_LOG.md: Template log for documenting execution evidence of the 21.7 rollout build, upgrade, and deployment validation steps.
frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md: Outlines all rollout steps with detailed instructions for upgrade‑safe linking verification and upcoming build/upgrade readiness tasks.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_1_21_2.md: Checklist for verifying core app functionality and detail pages after rollout 21.1–21.2 canister upgrades.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_3_21_4.md: Smoke‑test checklist for rollout 21.3–21.4 focusing on upgrade resilience and validation of detail pages and Edit Links dialogs.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_5_21_6.md: Smoke test checklist for rollout 21.5–21.6 verifying frontend loading, authentication, five detail routes, and Edit Links dialogs for admin and non-admin roles.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7_SESSION_LOG.md: Session log template for recording detailed results of the 21.7 smoke test, including principals, IDs, console errors, and per-role outcomes.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7.md: Smoke test checklist for rollout 21.7 including role-based testing, detail route verification, and Edit Links dialog checks with recorded entity IDs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Router structure, root error handling, and portal routing with authentication and approval gates.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Blocks access until a user is approved, showing pending UI and allowing approval requests.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Protects routes by requiring authentication and redirects or shows sign‑in UI when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign‑in/sign‑out button tied to Internet Identity with session clearing logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to complete their profile and submits profile data.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Displays an access‑denied message with guidance when a user lacks permissions.
frontend/src/components/feedback/EmptySt: Shows an empty‑state screen with optional icon and action button.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorBa: Renders a user‑friendly error alert with basic message mapping.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Shows a full‑screen skeleton loading indicator.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Displays the site header with navigation to home and optional auth button.
frontend/src/components/layout/PortalLay: Provides the portal UI layout with sidebar navigation, header, and role‑aware menu items.
frontend/src/components/related/EditLink: Simple button component for triggering link‑editing actions.
frontend/src/components/related/EditRela: Modal dialog for editing related entity links, handling loading, errors, and multi-select lists for each entity type.
frontend/src/components/related/MultiSel: Filtered multi-select list with search, checkboxes, and count tracking for selecting related entity IDs.
frontend/src/components/related/relatedR: Provides permission checks determining whether a user can edit records or memberships based on identity or admin status.
frontend/src/components/related/RelatedR: Displays linked record badges with label resolution based on user role and caller-accessible entities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and exposes the current user's role, admin status, approval state, and loading state using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkableEntityOpti: Provides a hook that returns normalized selectable entity lists for admins or non-admins based on query data and loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, approvals, and various domain entities via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the application's color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero content, service descriptions, and Internet Identity sign‑in flow.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminBoo: Explains how to initialize the first admin account using a secret token passed through the URL.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminDas: Displays admin-only stats, recent items, and links to entity management pages, loading data via multiple admin queries.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/RoleAssi: Admin-only page that lists authenticated users and lets administrators assign roles with immediate updates.
frontend/src/pages/portal/artists/Artist: Displays detailed artist development data, handles related-entity linking, and allows editing based on permissions.
Shows all artist development entries and provides an admin-only dialog to create new records.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/ReleaseD: Shows release details, normalizes arrays, and supports editing related links when permitted.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/Releases: Lists all releases and offers an admin-only form dialog to create new release entries.
frontend/src/pages/portal/memberships/Me: Displays and edits a single membership profile, including profile fields, status, and related entity links using query and mutation hooks.
Lists all membership profiles and allows admins to create new memberships via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/portal/publishing/Pub: Shows detailed information for a publishing work, supports editing notes, and manages related linked entities.
Displays the publishing catalog and provides a form for admins to create new publishing works with ownership split validation.
frontend/src/pages/portal/recordings/Rec: Shows recording project details, including participants and linked entities, and allows editing of related record associations.
React page listing recording projects, with admin-only dialog to create new projects and form handling for project fields.
frontend/src/utils/arrays.ts: Provides safe array utilities for normalizing unknown values to arrays and checking lengths and non-empty status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates ownership split percentages, ensuring totals are within 0–100%.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended theme settings, custom colors, fonts, keyframes, and plugins.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RE: Results template for recording upgrade-safe linking verification and smoke test outcomes across multiple rollout versions.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION.md: Manual QA checklist verifying upgrade-safe related-record linking across all entity detail pages for both admin and non-admin users.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, rollout history, known issues, and implemented features for the Higgins Music platform.
